titleStmt.title: A verye fruitful exposicion vpon the syxte chapter of Saynte Iohn diuided into. x. homelies or sermons: written in Latin by the ryghte excellente clarke Master Iohn Brencius, [and] tra[n]slated into English by Richard Shirrye, Londoner.
titleStmt.author: Brenz, Johannes, 1499-1570.
Sherry, Richard, ca. 1506-ca. 1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Daie, dwelling ouer Aldersgate, and Wylliam Seres dwelling in Peter Colledge,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our Lorde God M.D.L. [1550] the nynth daye of Apryll]

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exposicion vpon the. vi. chapter of Iohn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
